name: Scientific Trading Machine
body:
# What is Scientific Trading Machine?
Well well, Scientific Trading Machine or STM is a cool new forex system. A forex system is a collection of tools and strategies that help you make trades in the forex market to generate profits. STM consists of tutorial videos of trading strategies based on various scientifical methods.

## Who is the author of Scientific Trading Machine.
Nicola Delic - He is the man. He is a well versed trader with good experience in the FX market and has released systems in the past. This new system is based on strategies proven on his real accounts. Cool - heh?
